text: Amphiplica is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Caymanabyssiidae. ==Distribution== This is a globally abyssal genus.José H. Leal and M. G. Harasewych, Deepest Atlantic Molluscs: Hadal Limpets (Mollusca, Gastropoda, Cocculiniformia) from the Northern Boundary of the Caribbean Plate, Invertebrate Biology, Vol. 118, No. 2 pp. 116-136 ==Species== Species within the genus Amphiplica include: * Amphiplica concentrica (Thiele, 1909) * Amphiplica knudseni McLean, 1988 * Amphiplica plutonica Leal & Harasewych, 1999 * Amphiplica venezuelensis McLean, 1988 * Amphiplica (Gordabyssia) gordensis McLean, 1991 ==References== * Gofas, S.; Le Renard, J.; Bouchet, P. (2001). Mollusca, in: Costello, M.J. et al. (Ed.) (2001). European register of marine species: a check-list of the marine species in Europe and a bibliography of guides to their identification. Collection Patrimoines Naturels, 50: pp. 180–213 ==External links== * Category:Caymanabyssiidae
title: Amphiplica
